item.title: TCN
item.description: score:48 Chances: Tricon Residential, Inc. has shown a strong performance in the rental housing market, with a focus on single-family rental homes and multi-family rental apartments. The company’s annual sustainability report indicates a commitment to strategic sustainability priorities, which can attract environmentally conscious investors.
